p: The inhibition of biofilm formation against Staphylococcus aureus DSM 1104 was tested in 96-well tissue microtiter plates. The compounds were tested in concentrations of up to 256 µg/mL. MeOH and cytochalasin B were used as negative and positive control, respectively. Minimum Inhibitory Concentration (MIC) value of 256 µg/mL was observed for metabolite 169 and it showed a weak inhibition of biofilm formation of 20.78% at 256 µg/mL [ 52].
